breakfast.name: Overnight Oats with Berries and Nuts
breakfast.instructions: Combine oats, almond milk, chia seeds, and maple syrup in a jar or container. Mix well. Refrigerate overnight. In the morning, top with mixed berries and chopped almonds.

lunch.name: Quinoa Salad with Roasted Vegetables and Chickpeas
ingredients: 1 cup roasted vegetables (broccoli, bell peppers, zucchini, carrots)
lunch.instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C). Toss vegetables with 1 tablespoon olive oil, salt, and pepper. Roast for 20-25 minutes, or until tender. Combine cooked quinoa, roasted vegetables, chickpeas, remaining olive oil, and lemon juice in a bowl. Mix well. Top with feta cheese (if using).

dinner.name: Lentil Soup with Whole Wheat Bread
ingredients: 1 cup brown or green lentils, rinsed
dinner.instructions: Heat olive oil in a large pot over medium heat. Add onion, carrots, and celery and cook until softened, about 5-7 minutes. Add garlic, thyme, and cumin and cook for 1 minute more. Add lentils, vegetable broth, and bay leaf. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for 30-40 minutes, or until lentils are tender. Season with salt and pepper to taste. Remove bay leaf before serving. Serve with whole wheat bread.

snack.name: Greek Yogurt with Honey and Walnuts
snack.instructions: Combine all ingredients in a bowl and enjoy.
